channel.title: Need help with Error
channel.description:
[code] int[] returnCodes = Server.vb.checkUser(playerName,playerPass);
1 error [/code]
I was making my server mySQL integrated, and iv gotten that error. I dont know what exactly im suppose to do to fix it as iv followed the tut. Can someone show me how to integrate emulous with vbulletin, or a tutorial that can help with either emulous or vbulletin.
Thanks to all who help!

item.title: Need help with Error
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

I havent added anything to the server.java just yet, and it says its missing a variable. I dont know what exactly im suppose to add to server.java because the tutorial i read didnt have the information about what i should add. Also to anyone whos used emulous and have made your server mySQL integrated for vbulletion (or mybb) then contact me asap!

Note: Im using emulous, which is a packaged source.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Error
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

It simply cant find the vb variable from some sort of class which I presume is the server class. Can I see that Server variable?

Read full topic
